about.title: About Janadesh Party
about.subtitle: Building a transparent, digital, and prosperous Nepal through youth leadership and sustainable policies.

core-values.title: Our Core Values
core-values.subtitle: At Janadesh Party, our core values are the foundation of everything we do. We believe in transparency, inclusivity, and community-driven progress. Our commitment to these principles guides our actions and decisions as we work towards a better future for all.

manifesto.title: Manifesto
manifesto.subtitle: A Vision for a Digital and Prosperous Nepal

policies.title: Policies
policies.subtitle: Our vision and commitments for a stronger Nepal

register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Join our movement and be part of the change

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out with any questions or feedback.

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed with the latest news from Janadesh Party

missionVision.missionText: To empower every Nepali citizen through digital governance, ensuring transparency, accountability, and equal opportunities for all. We strive to build a nation where technology bridges the gap between the government and the people.
missionVision.visionText: A prosperous Nepal where youth leadership drives innovation, green economy sustains our future, and inclusive policies ensure no one is left behind. We envision a Nepal that stands tall on the global stage.

journey.heading: Our Journey
journey.subheading: From a student movement to a national force.

events.title: The Beginning
events.description: Started as a youth movement in universities.

events.title: First Convention
events.description: Officially registered as a political party.

values.heading: Our Core Values
values.subheading: The principles that guide Janadesh Party

transparency.title: Transparency (पारदर्शिता)
transparency.description: We believe in open governance where every decision, budget allocation, and process is visible to the public. Digital tools ensure real-time accountability.
transparency.why: Without transparency, we cannot achieve true democracy and development in the 21st century.

green.title: Green Economy (हरित अर्थतन्त्र)
green.description: Transitioning Nepal towards sustainable development through renewable energy, eco-tourism, and organic agriculture.
green.why: Without green growth, sustainable democracy is impossible.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure (पूर्वाधार)
infrastructure.description: Building smart cities and connecting rural Nepal with high-speed internet and reliable transportation networks.
infrastructure.why: Without infrastructure, national development cannot move forward.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity (समावेशी समाज)
inclusivity.description: A party for everyone. We champion the rights of minorities, women, and marginalized communities.

digital.title: Digital Governance (डिजिटल सुशासन)
digital.description: Eliminating bureaucracy through technology, smart IDs, online services, and blockchain-based records.
digital.why: Without digital governance, modern democracy cannot function.
